alerts.title: DHS funding cliff: FEMA BRIC -- 4 days to CR expiration
alerts.detail: The DHS Continuing Resolution expires on 2026-02-13. 4 days remain. FEMA BRIC (FEMA) may be affected if DHS funding lapses.

alerts.title: DHS funding cliff: FEMA Tribal Mitigation Plans -- 4 days to CR expiration
alerts.detail: The DHS Continuing Resolution expires on 2026-02-13. 4 days remain. FEMA Tribal Mitigation Plans (FEMA) may be affected if DHS funding lapses.

alerts.title: IIJA sunset: EPA STAG -- 233 days remaining
alerts.detail: EPA STAG is funded under auth_iija which expires September 30, 2026. 233 days remain. No reauthorization bill detected in scan results.

alerts.title: IIJA sunset: USBR WaterSMART -- 233 days remaining
alerts.detail: USBR WaterSMART is funded under auth_iija_watersmart which expires September 30, 2026. 233 days remain. No reauthorization bill detected in scan results.

alerts.title: IIJA fund-exhaustion: USDA Wildfire Defense Grants -- expires when funds exhausted
alerts.detail: USDA Wildfire Defense Grants is funded under auth_iija_wildfire with 'expires when funds exhausted' durability. No fixed calendar deadline, but IIJA one-time allocation is finite. Monitor fund obligation rates for depletion signals.
